snippet.title: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 - Dracula's Destiny Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out this trailer which introduces a range of key characters and adversaries that you will encounter in Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2.

Follow Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 at GameSpot.com!
http://www.gamespot.com/castlevania-lords-of-shadow-2/
